column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been here a number of times
column2: whether it be just for drinks
column3: brunch on a Sunday. Etc. This place is in the perfect area of West Loop. Very up and coming area
column4: that has some of the best restaurants. Thoroughly enjoy the food. Especially prosciutto breakfast pizza mmmm!!! I think the only thing is they were slightly overpriced on the bottle service for mimosas. Whereas you can find bottomless options at many places similar to them around the city. That won't stop me from coming back here. Just a thought though.
